data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Bioko Norte who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bioko Norte, Equatorial Guinea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Bioko Norte, Equatorial Guinea by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 21 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Bioko Norte. Through your servants plant 46 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Bioko Norte.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Santiago de Baney
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Santiago de Baney, Bioko Norte, Equatorial Guinea.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Bioko Norte, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 10,945 believers in Bioko Norte, Equatorial Guinea a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bioko Norte, Equatorial Guinea has a population of 231,600.

We estimate Bioko Norte has 10,945 people who might know Jesus, 195,796 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 24,859 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Bioko Norte to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
